name: Digital Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Welcome to Digital Jigsaw Puzzle!Digital Jigsaw Puzzle attempts to mimic how a person in the real world would put a jigsaw puzzle together. We are not a grid based game like most other jigsaw puzzle games. This game includes 150 different puzzles!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64 Bit Sound Card: Standard Sound Card Additional Notes: Mouse Required
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
